name: Hotel Regency

reviews.title: Good value small, newly renovated hotel just outside Monaco with a great view
reviews.text: Despite its rather unprepossessing exterior on a busy road running east from Monte Carlo, this small 3 star hotel provided bright, clean comfortable but small rooms with french windows and a balcony overlooking the bay. Recently redecorated, refreshed and renovated by its new owners, it provided a comfortable base for exploring Monaco, Edze and Cap Martin. Our room had a small flat screen TV, fridge with beers and soft drinks, the bathroom was small but perfectly adequate and spotless.

reviews.title: Best value for money and most welcoming staff in 6 months of travel
reviews.text: Breakfast was served on a pleasant sunny terrace where the owners had put an effort into tidying the garden and was of reasonable standard, but not exceptional.

reviews.title: Excellent location and very friendly staff
reviews.text: The hotel has free on-street parking, although spaces are at a premium and after dinner in Cap Martin we had to park 500m away in a side street.

reviews.title: Great Value and Location
reviews.text: The best little hotel we have come across in the whole of Europe..
